```{r}
library(SnowballC)
library(janeaustenr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidytext)
library(wordcloud)
library(tm)
```


```{r}
word_lists <- parole_sub %>%
  select(text) %>%
#  group_by(parole_sub$StoreId) %>%
  unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words) %>% 
  tolower() 
```


```{r}
wordcloud(word_lists, scale = c(2, 1), min.freq = 75, colors = rainbow(30))
```
